Text:
Tickler, firstly, excuse any error, English isn't mine first language (I'm brazilian). 
Well, now I'd like to thank you for sharing this album. To rip with FLAC isn't difficult, you'll see; it's just an habit question. 
If you want, mail me that I send you an invite to a torrent site where you'll find a lot of blues, rock'n roll and jazz in FLAC and APE.
Best regards,
Marcus
Thanks Marcus. I have sent you a personal message.
